== Ramanattukara (CT) (627435) ==

Ramanattukara (CT) is a town in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 11.71 sq. km. and harbouring 7755 households with total population of 35937 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 409 km. Male population is 17574 and female population is 18363. Scheduled Caste population is 3605 and Scheduled Tribes population is 38. Census Location Code of the town is 627435<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 20 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 20 km. Railway station is at Feroke at a distance of 5 km.
